channel.title: Artemisia Annua on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Artemisia Annua on funPlantGenes

item.title: AabHLH112
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AabHLH112 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: A.

item.title: AaDBR2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaDBR2 Gene Name: double-bond reductase 2 Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: We found that a trichome-specific transcription factor, AaWRKY9, positively regulates artemisinin biosynthesis by directly binding to the promoters of the artemisinin biosynthesis genes AaDBR2 and AaGSW1.

item.title: AaGSW1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaGSW1 Gene Name: glandular trichomeâ€“specific WRKY1 Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: We found that a trichome-specific transcription factor, AaWRKY9, positively regulates artemisinin biosynthesis by directly binding to the promoters of the artemisinin biosynthesis genes AaDBR2 and AaGSW1.

item.title: AaGSW2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaGSW2 Gene Name: Glandular secreting trichome 2 Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: The WRKY transcription factor AaGSW2 promotes glandular trichome initiation in Artemisia annua.

item.title: AaHD1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaHD1 Gene Name: HOMEODOMAIN PROTEIN 1 Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: HOMEODOMAIN PROTEIN 1 (AaHD1) is required for jasmonate-mediated glandular trichome initiation in Artemisia annua.

item.title: AaHD8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaHD8 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: Identify a homeodomain-leucine zipper (HD-ZIP) IV transcription factor, AaHD8, directly promoting the expression of AaHD1 for glandular trichome initiation in Artemisia annua.

item.title: AaLTP3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaLTP3 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: Lipid Transfer Proteins (AaLTP3 and AaLTP4) Are Involved in Sesquiterpene Lactone Secretion from Glandular Trichomes in Artemisia annua.

item.title: AaLTP4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaLTP4 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: Lipid Transfer Proteins (AaLTP3 and AaLTP4) Are Involved in Sesquiterpene Lactone Secretion from Glandular Trichomes in Artemisia annua.

item.title: AaMIXTA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaMIXTA1 Gene Name: MIXTA1 transcription factor Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: The roles of AaMIXTA1 in regulating the initiation of glandular trichomes and cuticle biosynthesis in Artemisia annua.

item.title: AaMYC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaMYC2 Gene Name: MYC2 transcription factor 2 Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: The jasmonate-responsive AaMYC2 transcription factor positively regulates artemisinin biosynthesis in Artemisia annua.

item.title: AaORA
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaORA Gene Name: octadecanoid-derivative responsive AP2-domain Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: AaTCP15, a JA and ABA dual-responsive teosinte branched1/cycloidea/proliferating (TCP) TF, which is essential for JA and ABA-induced artemisinin biosynthesis by directly binding to and activating the promoters of DBR2 and ALDH1, two genes encoding enzymes for artemisinin biosynthesis.

item.title: AaSEP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Aannua10729S694100 Gene Symbol: AaSEP1 Gene Name: AaSEPALLATA1 Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: Identified a MADS-box transcription factor, AaSEPALLATA1 (AaSEP1), that positively regulates GST initiation.

item.title: AaSPL9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Aannua01109S179380 Gene Symbol: AaSPL9 Gene Name: SQUAMOSA promoter-binding protein-like 9 Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: AaSPL9 could positively regulate the initiation of glandular trichome and artemisinin content in A.

item.title: AaTCP15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaTCP15 Gene Name: aldehyde dehydrogenase 1 Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: AaTCP15, a JA and ABA dual-responsive teosinte branched1/cycloidea/proliferating (TCP) TF, which is essential for JA and ABA-induced artemisinin biosynthesis by directly binding to and activating the promoters of DBR2 and ALDH1, two genes encoding enzymes for artemisinin biosynthesis.

item.title: AaWRKY1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaWRKY1 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: Isolation and Characterization of AaWRKY1, an Artemisia annua Transcription Factor that Regulates the Amorpha-4,11-diene Synthase Gene, a Key Gene of Artemisinin Biosynthesis.

item.title: AaWRKY17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Aannua01956S266050 Gene Symbol: AaWRKY17 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: AaWRKY17, a positive regulator of artemisinin biosynthesis, is involved in resistance to Pseudomonas syringae in Artemisia annua.

item.title: AaWRKY9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaWRKY9 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 9 Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: Our data suggested that the AaWRKY9 protein positively regulates artemisinin biosynthesis by directly binding to the W-boxes in the promoters of DBR2 and AaGSW1 and activating their expression AaWRKY9 contributes to light- and jasmonate-mediated to regulate the biosynthesis of artemisinin in Artemisia annua.

item.title: AaYABBY5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaYABBY5 Gene Name: YABBY family transcription factor 5 Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: Transcriptional regulation of flavonoid biosynthesis in Artemisia annua by AaYABBY5.

item.title: ALDH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ALDH1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: AaTCP15, a JA and ABA dual-responsive teosinte branched1/cycloidea/proliferating (TCP) TF, which is essential for JA and ABA-induced artemisinin biosynthesis by directly binding to and activating the promoters of DBR2 and ALDH1, two genes encoding enzymes for artemisinin biosynthesis.
